# Class preparation

Please download R and RStudio before the first class. You can find installation instructions [here](http://web.cs.ucla.edu/~gulzar/rstudio/).

# Links to classes

[Class 1](https://introtor-pse.appspot.com/class1.html): Introduction to data wrangling with the tidyverse

[Class 2](https://introtor-pse.appspot.com/class2.html): Inspecting, cleaning, plotting and analysing data

[Class 3 APE](https://introtor-pse.appspot.com/class3ape.html): Writing LaTeX articles and making websites using R Markdown

[Class 3 PPD](https://introtor-pse.appspot.com/class3ppd.html): Writing LaTeX articles and making websites using R Markdown

[Class 4](https://introtor-pse.appspot.com/class4.html): Introduction to web scraping with R
